body:
[Profile without lazy loading](https://perfht.ml/2oMvX09)

[Profile with lazy loading](https://perfht.ml/2q8ieEw)

When searching for "shield" on the main process, the top level item in the "without fix" profile is 17ms. When doing the same search on the "with fix" profile, that is 3ms.
